s0296.literal: Appraisal says: My aunt filled the rear palace as Consort Jieyu; father, sons, and brothers served in the bedchamber curtains; they frequently told me Emperor Cheng was good at cultivating his appearance and bearing, ascending the carriage standing upright, not looking back, not speaking hastily, not pointing personally, facing the court in profound silence, dignified like a god—one could call him the dignified bearing of a solemn Son of Heaven!
s0296.idiomatic: Appraisal: My aunt served in the rear palace as Consort Jieyu; father, sons, and brothers served in the emperor's private quarters. They frequently told me Emperor Cheng excelled at cultivating his appearance and bearing—ascending carriages standing upright, never looking back, never speaking hastily, never pointing personally, facing court in profound silence, dignified like a god. One could truly call him the solemn bearing of a Son of Heaven!

s0297.literal: He broadly surveyed ancient and modern times, accommodated straightforward words.
s0297.idiomatic: He broadly surveyed ancient and modern times, and accommodated straightforward words.

s0298.literal: The ministers performed their duties, the memorials and discussions are worthy of narration.
s0298.idiomatic: The ministers fulfilled their duties; the memorials and discussions are worthy of record.
